triples.name: Markov decision process
triples.relevance: Core mathematical framework for modeling constrained sequential decision-making problems.

triples.name: Linear programming
triples.relevance: The paper reduces the constrained control problem to an infinite linear programming formulation.

triples.name: Lagrange multiplier
triples.relevance: Lagrangian approach used for sensitivity analysis and obtaining asymptotical results.

triples.name: Expected value
triples.relevance: Foundation for expected average cost and expected total cost objectives in the constrained MDP framework.

triples.name: Discounting
triples.relevance: Discounted cost is a special case of the expected total cost objective studied in the paper.
